meanings.sent1: I enjoy ricing rice for dinner every night.
meanings.sent2: My mom is ricing the rice for our family meal.
meanings.sent3: Ricing rice is a skill I learned from my grandma.
meanings.sent4: The chef ricing the rice with precision and care.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of freshly riced rice filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: The act of modifying a vehicle to make it faster or more powerful.
meanings.sent1: His hobby is ricing cars to improve their speed.
meanings.sent2: Ricing can enhance the performance of a vehicle.
meanings.sent3: The ricing of his car made it the fastest in town.
meanings.sent4: The ricing of the car turned heads wherever it went.
meanings.sent5: The ricing of the vehicle was a labor of love for the mechanic.

meanings.definition: The process of converting data into a format suitable for use in a computer system.
meanings.sent1: Data ricing is essential for efficient computer operations.
meanings.sent2: Ricing data ensures compatibility with the system.
meanings.sent3: The team's ricing of the data saved the project.
meanings.sent4: The ricing of information streamlined the workflow.
meanings.sent5: Efficient ricing of data is crucial for data analysis.
